title: Honey and lemon cookies
ingredients: ['100g unsalted butter, softened', '100g caster sugar', '1 egg', '225g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '5 tablespoons honey', '4 tablespoons natural yoghurt', '2 teaspoons grated lemon zest', '1/2 teaspoon lemon extract', 'Icing', '125g icing sugar', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 teaspoons grated lemon zest']
